subject: Re: [junit] New file uploaded to junit
msgSnippet: I haven t been following this very closely, but GSBase (http://gsbase.sourceforge.net) already has some powerful tools for building collections of tests,
messageBody:
I haven't been following this very closely, but GSBase
(http://gsbase.sourceforge.net) already has some powerful tools for
building collections of tests, including RecursiveTestSuite (all test
case classes in a given source directory) and OrderedTestSuite (the
ability to specify the order of a number of tests in a single test case
without having to specify the order of all the tests).

Writing it is a good exercise; but, if you prefer to leverage what has
already been written...

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********
